metadata.title: CVE-2023-29416 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libbzip3.a in bzip3 before 1.3.0. Abz3_decode_block out-of-bounds write can occur with a crafted archivebecause bzip3 does not follow the required procedure for interacting withlibsais.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29416` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bzip3 - 1.4.0-1
libbzip3-0 - 1.4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bzip3 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-1').
